feed.title: La Grande Rivière - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , La Grande Rivière
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:01 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -37.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Grande Rivière Airport 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -37.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -48
Dewpoint: -40.7°C
Wind: WSW 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. High minus 28.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 53 this morning and minus 43 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 35. Wind chill near minus 48. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23.
